name: Kaedehara Kazuha
title: Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves: Kaedehara Kazuha
desc: Flowers and birds are a dear pleasure to one winding under the moonlight.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kaedehara Kazuha to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Chihayaburu
skills.desc: Deals 3 <span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo DMG, attaches <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Midare Ranzan to this character. If this skill triggers Swirl, <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Midare Ranzan is converted to the Swirled Element.<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After the Skill DMG is finalized: Your team switches to the next character.

skills.name: Kazuha Slash
skills.desc: Deals 3 <span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo DMG and summons <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Autumn Whirlwind.
